titleInfo.title: 'File 21/32 Compensation paid by B.O.A.C [British Overseas Airways Corporation] to its employees'

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 13; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 2-11; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled, and are located in the same position as the main sequence.

mods.abstract: The file contains papers relating to the individual case of compensation paid to the family of Hussein B. Matruh (also written Hussain bin Matrook), a British Overseas Airways (BOAC) employee, following his death. The file contains correspondence between C Hailey, Station Manager for BOAC in Bahrain, Tom Hickinbotham, Political Agent in Bahrain, and Charles Dalrymple Belgrave, Adviser to the Government of Bahrain.The file includes receipt of compensation payment, signed by the son of the deceased (folio 11).Folio 12 is internal office notes.
